name: SokoMatch3
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2019 kenney game jam, this game we made the unlikely combination (the theme) of a classic Sokoban and a Match3 game.

You still need to resolve a maze to reach the end, but now you can match 3 or more tiles of the same type for making them disappear !

Use keyboard arrow to move and push a box.
Only boxes with an orange aura can be pushed.
Try to make the least possible moves.
